Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hello there, friend.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yes, I know. How foolish it is, to imagine a friend for myself, isn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: "But, foolish though I may be, I'm willing to believe that you are good, or at least, one that is trustworthy.", 4: '1'}
{3: "After all, you are my imagination. I can't betray myself, now, can't I?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'There are some things that I must, and can only, tell you.'}
{3: "I don't know if I can even live until tomorrow."}
{3: "Anyway, it's foolish. Pure, distilled foolishness."}
{3: 'But still, please listen to what I have to say.'}
{3: "About the truth... and what we've just realized about this world."}
{3: 'About... things that might go poof—without a trace—after today. About things that might change what common sense means.'}
{3: 'Before the real "battle" begins, a myriad of events will take place.'}
{3: 'You do hear me, do you? You are not ignoring these seemingly meaningless words of mine, are you?'}
{3: 'My friend.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{3: '【kuroname】...'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Oh you. How can you fall asleep at a regular briefing?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Well, you did get it rough in Kowloong. I guess you do need a little rest, maybe?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Speaking of...', 3: '28', 4: '...This still feels a little surreal.', 5: '29'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "What's the matter?", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1201_5.jpg'}
{3: 'Memories flash past you. You seem to still feel Lucia leaning on your back.'}

{3: 'The scent, the smell of vital fluid, the lingering warmth of her heat ventilation... Could the briefing before you be but a dream? Are you perhaps still in Kowloong, with Lucia still leaning against you...?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{3: 'The feeling of Celica lightly smacking your head brings everything sharply back to reality.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sorry, was just spacing out.', 3: '37', 4: "It's okay. Nothing to worry about.", 5: '38'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "...This is the flimsiest response for daydreaming that I've ever seen.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "What's wrong? 【kuroname】 did great work in Kowloong. There's no need to be so harsh, aye?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'I am just reminding 【kuroname】 to rest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...Come to think of it. You've all been crammed with missions after missions.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Even with your excellent performance, we might've been overworking you all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "How about this, why don't I give you—no, you folks a vacation? Now that a few safe zones have been established on the surface, this should be doable.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "In that case, can I join them? President, see, I've basically been working seven days a week for a while now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Here's the thing, I'd love to say yes, but...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Okay, what's the reason this time?", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I need someone to help me chair the reconstruction of Kowloong Metropolis, Wuming City, and K-44. And, we have to arrange local intelligence officers for infiltration recon of the Monastery of Purity...', 4: '2'}
{3: "Seeing Celica slowly rolling her eyes to Hassen's chatter, you feel a chuckle building up within you."}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '...Anyhow, sorry, but please understand. If I get the chance to arrange a vacation for you, I will. Definitely.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: '...Overtime pay. Double.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Okay. Back to the topic. Since it's a vacation, let's also get the other squads that came back from Kowloong.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Yep. Gray Raven, Strike Hawk, and the others that helped out.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'In that case, hmm, what to do with the location...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'What are you talking about? Why are you all gathered around 【kuroname】?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'President Hassen is suggesting that we send the returning squads from Kowloong to a safe zone for a vacation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'In that case, I know a place.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Caribbean Sea, Area D. It was a famous beach area until Operation Acadia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Now, plagued with not even a single tourist, it's a better-than-ever vacation spot.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "But we don't have that many forces stationed in that area...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "That's because the viral density there is very low, and the garrisons there are just to keep an eye out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Besides, with the reconstruction teams working away in the other safe zones, our vacation-goers won't get any peace and quiet, yeah?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: '...I see. You do have a point.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Area D should be a good choice. It used to be the center of some integration plan of the World Government.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'It had the best-of-the-best entertainment from before po-pan, all in this one place.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sounds nice.', 3: '81', 4: "Looks like I don't have much of a choice.", 5: '81'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Bottling it all up can mess with you. Gotta let your stress out from time to time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Oh, how nice it must be. I also wanted to go to the beach with you guys...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "It's not a common occasion. You should use it to get to know your teammates better.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory21.jpg'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...What's wrong, Commandant?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Commandant, your expression doesn\'t seem like it\'s "nothing."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I feel like I went through a lot. I might need some time to fully recover and return to my previous condition.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But Asimov and President Hassen told me that I'll have the time to do so.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'After I recover, I can be your blade again, just like before.', 4: '1'}
{3: '...You tell Lucia about the vacation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...A vacation? Sure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's also a good opportunity to reacquaint with everyone, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah.', 3: '99', 4: "There's no need to reacquaint, right?", 5: '104'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "That one's Liv... That's Lee... That's Ayla...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Okay. Ready.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's go tell the others, shall we?", 3: '107'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Indeed... We've all known each other for quite some time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then let's take this opportunity to relax.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's go tell the others, shall we?", 3: '107'}
{3: 'Lucia takes your hand and drags you out.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Am I acting based on my intuitions, or memories? Or... am I just being the Lucia that Commandant wants me to be?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...I am who I am.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "...No matter what happens, I will stay by Commandant's side. I am the leader of Gray Raven, Lucia. This will never change.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory45.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: '...What plans are you hatching?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You needed help. I gave it.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "You're not the type to recommend vacation spots. And may I remind you that Lucia's frame—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "—The problem about her memory data hindering her combat performance? There are enough combatants going with her. There shouldn't be any issues.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Then why Area D?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You'll know why when it's over.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...Looks like they'll need a vacation extension after this one.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Never mind, I'll get it sorted out. One last thing—what did you send Cerberus to do? They went dark on our surveillance system.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: '...I might be obliged to tell you, but I would prefer not to.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Very well. In that case, I'll get Asimov to give a little something to Gray Raven's commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'A little something?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'To make sure it all goes well, I think your plan needs the help of that thing.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory139.png'}
{3: 'In the vast and endless sea of sand, three figures trudge...'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Argh! Why do we hafta hop there on foot from the frontlines HQ?!'}
{2: '???', 3: "We blew it with the Forsakens. They ain't lending us their wheelies."}
{2: '???', 3: "C'mon, man. At least get Babylonia to airdrop us some of em' self-folding cars or something..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Can you two stuff it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Keep that up and I'll just turn you two off, then tow you both to the mission site.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'You hear that, Blackjack? No more noise.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Bog off, you.'}
